MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 用來同步存取 物件的物件。

span.span: An object used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是安全執行緒。 is not thread safe. 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用這個屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using this property. 同步處理的程式碼必須執行作業屬性類別，不是直接在類別本身。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the class, not directly on the class itself. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CPP/asnencodeddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/CS/asnencodeddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.AsnEncodedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.AsnEncodedData/VB/asnencodeddata.vb#1)]
